title: Leading bar soap brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Soap Bar Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Soap Bar Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Soap Bar Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Soap Bar Brand on the y axis.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Soap Bar Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Soap Bar Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Soap Bar Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Soap Bar Brand on the y axis.
The Sales in million GBP is highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
The second highest Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the Soap Bar Brand Imperial Leather.
The maximum Soap Bar Brand Dove has got 4.62 times higher Sales in million GBP than the minimum Soap Bar Brand Simple.
The average Sales in million GBP in all 3 Soap Bar Brands is 14.57.
